document_data.title: Thimblerigging
document_data.story arc:
[[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]]
Storm King's Descent
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Thimblerigging''''', designed by [[Greg Marks]] and [[M.T. Black]], is an adventure in the [[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]] storyline published for the [[Adventurers League]]. It is the third part of the Storm King's Descent series. 

{{Quote|''The chase is on to recover the stolen Wyrmskull Throne. Getting ahead of the Cult of the Dragon will require secret lore, favors from new friends—and an excursion to a site of forgotten horrors.''{{Cite adventurers league/Thimblerigging|1}}|}}
